p: Of the 115 anti-HEV IgM positive samples that were sent to CDC, 73 (64%) were positive for HEV RNA; none of the anti-HEV IgM negative samples (n = 403) were positive for HEV RNA. In CDC laboratory, all of the samples that tested anti-HEV IgM negative in Bangladesh except one were negative (402 of 403) and all of the anti-HEV IgM samples that tested positive in Bangladesh except two were positive (113 of 115).
